project_name: UPM-Liverpool Liver Building Hot Tap Investigation & Repair (2 x Hot Taps)
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Roberta Wilkinson (2):work order closed by Miss Maymie Sporer (3):work commencement by Miss Maymie Sporer (4):work planning by Miss Maymie Sporer (5):offer approved (6):offer submitted by Miss Maymie Sporer (7):sor submitted / draft by Miss Maymie Sporer

scope_of_work.notes: This LSQ is to repair the 2 x Hot/Cold taps only, any additional works to kitchen appliances will require a separate LSQ
scope_of_work.problem: Liverpool Liver Building Hot Tap Investigation & Repair (2 x Hot Taps)  - Hot Taps at the locations are not operating correctly and require remedial action to repair so that they are available for use on 1st May 2025 when the office goes fully live
scope_of_work.scope: Specialist Contractor to attend site and investigate, service an repair both hot taps so that they are in full working order, these taps are situated in the Kitchenette and Main Kitchen of the Liver Building Office Space
scope_of_work.justification: These taps are required to provide cold and hot water to the end users within the Liver Building Office without these taps there is no facility within the Kyndryl floor at the location to provide hot/cold water
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: The Hot/Cold taps will not be available and in full working order for 1st May 2025 when site goes live

status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):rejected (2):offer submitted by Alayna Beatty (3):offer submitted by Alayna Beatty (4):sor submitted / draft by Alayna Beatty

scope_of_work.problem: Small leak on pump 8 identified. After further investigation it has been found that the Mechanical Seal of Secondary Pump 8 has failed causing water to leak from pup shaft.
scope_of_work.scope: Specialist contractor to attend site drain water from pump 8, remove PUMP to Motor coupling, remove the failed pump seal, replace with new OEM pump seal, refill system, refit PUMP to MOTOR coupler, test system and confirm running
scope_of_work.justification: Secondary Pump 8 is currently isolated leaving chilled water system at N resiliency. Repair to pump 8 is required to restore resiliency to system.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: system will remain at N with no redundant pump in the event of failure

status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):cancelled by Neil Hauck (2):offer submitted by Neil Hauck (3):sor submitted / draft by Lola Wuckert

scope_of_work.notes: Cameras to be tested and proved working on completion
scope_of_work.problem: Multiple CCTV Cameras at KYNDRYL Greenford have failed and require repair. Cameras 6, 7 and 65 have been identified and require repair ASAP
scope_of_work.scope: To replace camera 6, 7 and 65 with new and commission onto milestone system
scope_of_work.justification: At present there is reduced CCTV coverage on the roof of the Greenford location cameras 6 and 7 are required to monitor the roof connection from the adjacent post office building.Camera 65 is located behind the West Side Generators along the fence line. This camera is required due to homeless camping in the adjacent plot.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: cameras will remain offline with reduced coverage in the above areas

status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Roberta Wilkinson (2):work order closed by Alayna Beatty (3):work planning by Roberta Wilkinson (4):offer approved (5):offer submitted by Neil Hauck (6):sor submitted / draft by Neil Hauck

scope_of_work.notes: Chiller to be de-gassed, and repaired carried out. Re-gassed and placed back in use
scope_of_work.problem: during recent maintenance of chiller 5A a small leak was found on the sub cooler that requires repair
scope_of_work.scope: to recover all gas from system and then carry out leak repair. pressure test system and confirm repair. recharge with reclaimed gas and top up as required
scope_of_work.justification: repair required to stop chiller gas leaking to atmosphere and also bring chiller back into service
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: chiller will continue to leak and will remain offline

project_name: UPM-DRUPS 4 Fuel Tank Polish and Clean
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Roberta Wilkinson (2):work order closed by Alayna Beatty (3):work commencement by Neil Hauck (4):work planning by Neil Hauck (5):offer approved (6):offer submitted by Neil Hauck (7):sor submitted / draft by Neil Hauck

scope_of_work.notes: Quote valid for 30 days SDM to carry out works on receipt of PO
scope_of_work.problem: During routine sampling of fuel it was found that DRUPS 4 fuel is contaminated and requires remedial action.
scope_of_work.scope: To remove all fuel from DRUPS 4 tank and carry out a maned entry clean. recover re usable fuel and return it to tank post clean. (fuel to be topped up post works)
scope_of_work.justification: dirty fuel being used in DRUPS tank could effect the running of the machine and put business load at risk
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: risk of contaminated fuel could be used through DRUPS and cause damage to the engine
